results.title: The effect of metformin therapy on serum thyrotropin and free thyroxine concentrations in patients with type 2 diabetes: a meta-analysis
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ does not affect serum FT4 levels in euthyroid and @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroid@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: TSH lowering effects of metformin: a possible mechanism of action
results.text_hl: Preliminary clinical evidence suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has TSH lowering effects in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with T2DM and @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@ or in those with TSH serum levels in the upper normal value.

results.title: Impact of metformin on hypothalamic-pituitary-thyroid axis activity in women with autoimmune and non-autoimmune subclinical hypothyroidism: a pilot study
results.text_hl: The current study aimed to compare the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on hypothalamic-pituitary-thyroid axis activity between subjects with mild @<m>DISEASE_Hypothyroidism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007037 @@@hypothyroidism@@@ of different origins.
